name: Buzz Aldrin's Race into Space
description:
Buzz Aldrin's Race into Space is a strategy game developed by Strategic Visions. It was originally released in 1993. Interplay Productions published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Buzz Aldrin's Race into Space is available on PC.
It was produced by Brian Fargo, Bruce Schlickbernd, Jacob R. Buchert III and Jeremy Airey. It was scored by Charles Deenen.
